alert.note: Alert for Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Coastal Atlantic; Coastal Ocean; Eastern Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 12 at 3:59AM EST until January 13 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Delaware, Delaware Beaches. In New Jersey, Eastern Monmouth, Atlantic Coastal Cape May, Coastal Atlantic and Coastal Ocean. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 5 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southeast winds will increase late Friday into Friday evening. Extremely saturated soils due to previous rainfall events may result in trees and power poles being more more susceptible to wind. Sporadic wind gusts up to 60 mph are possible along the immediate coastline. .
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Coastal Atlantic; Coastal Ocean; Eastern Monmouth
